ccUploadFilePageNotificationProgressMess: Please wait for your file to be validated and uploaded
ccUploadFilePageGuidanceMessage: To upload products and landings, you will need to read and understand the
ccUploadFilePageFileUploadText: Upload the CSV file from your device
ccUploadFilePageValidationFailedParagrap: If any rows in your upload fail validation, you can:
ccUploadFilePageValidationFailedAdviceOn: Correct the data in the original CSV file, clear the uploaded data then re-upload the updated CSV file, or
ccUploadFilePageValidationFailedAdviceTw: Make a note of the failed landings, click save and continue, then add landings manually or upload a new file.
ccUploadFilePageTableProductInvalidError: Product ID is no longer valid and has been removed. You will need to create a new product favourite and ID
ccUploadFilePageTableDateLandedFutureMax: Date landed can be no more than {{dynamicValue}} days in the future
ccUploadFilePageTableVesselInvalidLicens: Date landed must correspond to when the vessel was licensed
ccUploadFilePageTableVesselLandingDateSe: {{dynamicValue}} was subject to fishing restrictions on your specified Landing date. Please refer to GOV.UK for further guidance.
ccUploadFilePageTableVesselStartDateSeas: {{dynamicValue}} was subject to fishing restrictions on your specified start date. Please refer to GOV.UK for further guidance.
ccCommonDateLandedRealError: Date landed must be a real date
ccCommonExportWeightDecimalPlacesError: Enter the export weight as a number with a maximum of 2 decimal places
ccCommonExportWeightGreaterError: Enter the export weight as a number greater than 0
ccStartDateInvalidError: Start date must be a real date
ccStartDateMaxError: Start date must not be after the date landed
ccArrivalDateValidationError: Arrival date must be a real date
ccUploadFilePageErrorInvalidFile: The selected file is invalid. For example, the data could be inaccessible, corrupt, or in the wrong structure.
ccUploadFilePageErrorAvFailed: There is a problem with the file upload service. Please try again later or enter your products and landings manually.
ccUploadFilePageErrorMaxFileSize: The selected file must be smaller than {{dynamicValue}}KB
ccUploadFilePageErrorMissing: You need to choose a file before you can upload a file
ccUploadFilePageErrorInvalidFileType: The selected file must be a CSV
ccUploadFilePageErrorMaxLandings: The selected file should contain a maximum of {{dynamicValue}} rows
ccUploadFilePageErrorFileRequired: Upload a valid CSV file to continue
ccUploadFilePageTableEEZMaxCharError: You are only able to add maximum of {{dynamicValue}} EEZ
